Thing.name: additionalType
Thing.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

Place.name: aggregateRating
Place.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Place.name: containedIn
Place.description: The basic containment relation between places.

Place.name: event
Place.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place or organization.

Place.name: events
Place.description: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, event).

Place.name: geo
Place.description: The geo coordinates of the place.

Place.name: globalLocationNumber
Place.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

Place.name: interactionCount
Place.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this itemâ€”for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

Place.name: isicV4
Place.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

Place.name: logo
Place.description: URL of an image for the logo of the item.

Place.name: map
Place.description: A URL to a map of the place.

Place.name: maps
Place.description: A URL to a map of the place (legacy spelling; see singular form, map).

Place.name: openingHoursSpecification
Place.description: The opening hours of a certain place.

Place.name: photos
Place.description: Photographs of this place (legacy spelling; see singular form, photo).

Place.name: reviews
Place.description: Review of the item (legacy spelling; see singular form, review).
